snippet: President Obama on Friday said that Republicans were holding Loretta E. Lynch “hostage” to a legislative disagreement unrelated to her nomination as attorney general.
abstract: Pres Obama calls out Republicans for stalling on confirmation of Loretta E Lynch's as United States attorney general.
lead_paragraph: President Obama on Friday said that Republicans were holding Loretta E. Lynch “hostage” to a legislative disagreement unrelated to her nomination as attorney general.

headline.main: Obama Calls Nominee ‘Hostage’ of Trafficking Dispute
headline.print_headline: National Briefing | Washington; Obama Calls Nominee ‘Hostage’ of Trafficking Dispute
